casebody.data:
Linda H. LAMONE, et al., appellants,
v.
O. John BENISEK, et al. No. 18-726. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 4, 2019.

Motion of David Trone for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Further consideration of the question of jurisdiction is postponed to the hearing of the case on the merits. The case will be set for argument in the March argument session.
